name: searchEditorialVideos
description: This endpoint searches for editorial videos. If you specify more than one search parameter, the API uses an AND condition. For example, if you set the `category` parameter to "Alone,Performing" and also specify a `query` parameter, the results include only videos that match the query and are in both the Alone and Performing categories.  You can also filter search terms out in the `query` parameter by prefixing the term with NOT.

query.description: One or more search terms separated by spaces

category.description: Show editorial content with each of the specified editorial categories; specify category names in a comma-separated list

country.description: Show only editorial video content that is available for distribution in a certain country

supplier_code.description: Show only editorial video content from certain suppliers

date_start.description: Show only editorial video content generated on or after a specific date

date_end.description: Show only editorial video content generated on or before a specific date

resolution.description: Show only editorial video content with specific resolution

fps.description: Show only editorial video content generated with specific frames per second

cursor.description: The cursor of the page with which to start fetching results; this cursor is returned from previous requests

$ul: **next**: Cursor value that represents the next page of results
**prev**: Cursor value that represents the previous page of results
**search_id**: Unique identifier for the search request
